description: Rangers v Motherwell: Pick of the stats
title: Rangers v Motherwell: Pick of the stats
title_page: Rangers v Motherwell: Pick of the stats  - BBC Sport
maintext: This will be Barry Ferguson's first home league game as Rangers manager. The Ibrox side have won each of the past eight occasions a manager has taken charge of his first home league match since Stuart McCall drew 1-1 with Livingston in the Scottish Championship in March 2015. The last to lose his first such match was Tommy McLean in November 1983 (2-1 v Celtic).
